articles.title: Feeling yet to sink in but my life hasn’t changed at all: Pat Cummins on IPL big bucks - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The world No.1 Test bowler was bought by Kolkata Knight Riders for a record Rs 15.5 crore (AUD 3.17 million), making him the highest paid foreign player in the history of the league.
